scripts.old package¶

Submodules¶

scripts.old.RaDecDebugOptim module¶

Created on 28 May 2017

Code to debug the delay in the estimated target RA,DEC crossings seen on Fort Summer. Trying to obtain via optimization the effective griffin angle used to get the telescope RA,DEC of the telemtry.

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.RaDecDebugTPA module¶

Created on 28 May 2017

Code to debug the delay in the estimated target RA,DEC crossings seen on Fort Summer. Using the TPA values instead of griffinBAngleDegrees.

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.SCDebug module¶

Created on 23 May 2017

Plotting of: Estimator-SC errors in SC ref. frame Estimator-SC errors in Gondola ref. frame Biases

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.SC_Est module¶

Created on 23 May 2017

Plotting of: Estimator-SC errors in SC ref. frame Estimator-SC errors in Gondola ref. frame Biases

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.SC_Est_errors module¶

Created on 23 May 2017

Plotting of: Estimator-SC errors in SC ref. frame Estimator-SC errors in Gondola ref. frame Biases

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.Starcam2GyrosShow module¶

Created on 24 abr. 2017

Script to show the impact of an error in roll.

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.covs module¶

Created on 28 May 2017

Plotting of the estimated biases and the diagonal values of the covariance matrix P In addition, a plot of the diagonal values of the P rotated by the qGyros2Starcam.

See utils.dataset.plotCovs() to obtain similar results

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.plotThermoFN module¶

Created on Jun 22, 2017

Plot raw data from a field. Merging archives if we want.

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.plotThermometersArchivesMerged module¶

Created on 10 jul. 2017

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.propagation module¶

Created on 28 abr. 2017

Propagates the gyroscopes applying to them only a matrix M (no bias). Plots the comparison between the Propagation, the Starcamera and the estimated by Boop. @author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.qPropagation module¶

Created on 23 May 2017

Plotting of the gyroscopes propagation, starting from the first Starcamera solution. Comparing with Starcamera and Estimator in Gyros ref frame.

@author: Marc Casalprim

scripts.old.quatDebug module¶

Created on 17 may. 2017

Generates the quaternions from the archive and three possible qSC2G rotations (old,mid,new). Useful to play with them after in a n interactive console, to see if the math is correct and debug.

@author: Marc Casalprim
